english: You will die here today, Ertugrul.

text: Ama senin o pis kanın benim ellerime demeyecek.
english: But that dirty blood of yours won't touch me.
Build a tree.
He will die hanging. As you command, sir.
I'm really sorry.

text: Selahattin Kervansarayı'nda Nasır'ın Türkmenlerle giriştiği isyan...
english: The rebellion in the Salatin Caravansary where Nasir fought the Turkmens.
It is over before it starts, His Highness Ameer.
How do you know that?
Nasir is with me.
I took him to the tribe.

text: İki değerli komutanından bir tanesi elimde.
english: I have one of the two valuable commanders...
The other one is with us.
You're lying.
Then come here.

text: Sana bir ayran aşı ikram edelim.
english: Let me offer you a special dose.
See for yourself.
I have been with you since I was a child.
One day after another.
Did I say anything bad to you?
I said what I said to your face.

text: Bir gün arkandan kuyunu kastım mı...
english: Did I dig your well one day?

text: Hep senin için, obamız için Cenk'im.
english: It's all for you, for our tribe, Cengit.
I gave my wife and my sons to the Mongols.

text: Sanki bunlar yaşanmamış gibi Ertuğrul'un iftiralarına maruz kalmaktan bıktım usandım.
english: I am sick and tired of seeing Ertugrul's slanders as if they were never happened.
I'll take care of the things in the tribe.
We're both in this together.
How many times have we been stabbed?

text: Niye? Hep senin dik kafalı oğlun Ertuğrul yüzünden! Yeter!
english: Why? Because of Ertugrul, the son of all of them! Enough!

text: Artık bu işin böyle gitmeyeceğini bilmelisin Süleyman.
english: You should know that this won't go like this, Süleyman.
you'll be the last breath I have.
Find him.
Do as I say.
We're going to Kayi tribe.
Without any hesitation.
We are done, Shahzada.
Take the man to Sultan Aladdin.
I'm sure he died.
Long live Prince Yigitalp.
He is in the palace for now.
You should kill him too, Afsin.
Godspeed, Kulak.

text: İbnül Arabi'nin kanı ve emaneti yolumuzu aydınlatacaktır.
english: The blood and the trust of Ibn Arabi will lighten our path.
I trust you, son.

text: Birbirimizin dilinden çok iyi anlıyoruz üstad.
english: We understand each other's language very well, Ustad.
But to go to the Muslims...
I cannot convince anyone of the tribe.

text: Sen de Hristiyanların üzerine akına git o vakit.
english: Then you should go to the Christians.

text: Biz sana kafir ortodoksların üstüne gidebilmen için...
english: We are here to help you overcome the infidels...
We offer you a golden chance.
We'll both be successful.
When I was getting the treasure with my Alps...

text: Kafir dediğin Hristiyanlar sizden medet umacak.
english: Christians who call themselves unbelievers will ask for your help.
will fall on your lap.
I keep saying that..
I want to travel with you.
Are you ready, Dervish? I am, my Bey.
Come on then.
Is it possible for me to come with you?
We are companions.
Co-operating is important, Dervish.
One's intentions are obvious on the road.
What do you want, Mario?
Isadora, my daughter!
Who will save him?
...our weapons...
...will not stop.
No more defense!
There is a complaint!

text: Her daim cenk için hazır olun!
english: Be ready for a war!

text: Alep'te sana zulmeden bu adamın cezasını sen kes.
english: You will pay for this man's crime in Aleppo.
This is your right.
The sword is with the winner.
...is the best of the Ozan.
You are the most merciful of all.
Forgive this servant's sins.
Enough is enough.
Yehuda, brother.
We have a history of death.
We don't trust you, you know that.

text: Sizinle tedbiri elden bırakmayın da Titus biraz sonra Turgut'u getirir.
english: Don't let him get away with it. Titus will bring Turgut back soon.
I'm always ready, son.
You cannot escape the will of God.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, izin ver de şu takastan önce şu...
english: Ertugrul Bey, let me ask you something before the auction.

text: Şehir maymunun ağzını burnunu bir kırayım ya.
english: I'll break the city monkey's nose.
We have a deal, Rapsun Bey.
If they don't keep their word...
Your blood is my blessing.

text: Ters bir şey olursa bana nasıl haber vereceğinizi biliyorsunuz.
english: If something goes wrong, you know how to tell me.

text: Bunlara güven olmaz. Mutlaka pislik yaparlar bunlar Ertuğrul Bey.
english: I cannot trust them. They will definitely do something bad, Ertugrul Bey.
We will continue walking after the break.
I heard you killed the priest.
I've seen some of those.
So, your day has come.
I met Afsin Bey when I was in Constantinople.

text: Ben de sana bir şey söyleyeyim mi Ertuğrul?
english: I'll tell you something, Ertugrul.
Shahzada Noman.
I wonder who killed him.
The dark side of the state.
Afişe, please.
We will continue after this.
More valuable than your Alp.
In my eyes.

text: Zavallı fakir Hristiyanların kanına emen bir sülükten başka hiçbir şey değilsin.
english: You are nothing but a curse to the poor Christians.

text: Vallahi bir tuzak yoktur bu işin içinde.
english: There is no trap for this.
What will happen?

text: Başımın etini yedin, yedin, yedin durdun.
english: You ate my meat.

text: Bir başına götürür işte Turgut karındaşımı.
english: We will take him to Turgut.

text: Ya mu varsa Ertuğrul Bey onun yedi ceddini vay vay vay!
english: If there is a problem, Ertugrul Bey will solve it.
Maybe he's a prisoner.
Turgut.
We met again, Turk.
Here comes the crazy deniz.

text: Duruma bas kaldırmanın vakti geldi de geçiyor bile.
english: It's time to stop this crime.
to the lands.
We came here with a thousand hopes, my Bey.
We wanted to be happy.
...every day.
...who have given us their lives...
If I don't make them suffer a thousand times...

text: Bana da bu alemde er demesinler.
english: I don't want to be called a man of honor.
What is the matter?
I'll take Turgut.
They are not.
He is so stubborn.
A lock that will open every door.

text: Her duvarı aşacak bir yiğit vardır Deli Demir.
english: There is a brave man who can overcome any obstacle, Deli Demir.
What if we can't get Turgut?
We will do our best.
if you bring Turgut back to this tribe, my Bey.
She will find life again.
I promise Aykiz.

text: Onları bu topraklarda baş göz edeceğiz.
english: We will keep them in these lands.
If God permits.
I'll set off.

text: Alplerle yol hazırlığımız var. Bileğine kuvvet verin.
english: We have preparations with the Alps. Be strong.
See you on the road.

text: Kara Toygar geldi ezdi. El Aziz de yıkıp geçti. Aşıtı keferesi de ayrı bir dert. Biz neredeyiz beyim? Moğol peşimizdeyken sürüm daha besiliydi. Sayısı daha çoktu. Şimdi elimizde kala kala eti kemiğe yapışmış kırk büyük baş kalmış.
english: The black togar came and crushed it. And the el aziz destroyed it. The love of the infidels is a different matter. Where are we, my Bey? When the Mongols were after us, the herd was more fertile. The number was more. Now we have 40 big heads stuck to the meat and the meat is stuck to the bone.

text: Niye? Celallenip kafa tutmadığımız kimse kalmadı da ondan beyim.
english: The black togar came and crushed it. And the el aziz destroyed it. The love of the infidels is a different matter. Where are we, my Bey? When the Mongols were after us, the herd was more fertile. The number was more. Now we have 40 big heads stuck to the meat and the meat is stuck to the bone.

text: Bize yazık değil mi? Çoluk çocuğumuzun rızkını kurde kuşa yemettik.
english: Aren't we sorry? We didn't feed our children to the birds.

text: Doğrudur beyim doğrudur. Doğrudur böyle olmaz. Ben bu sürüdeki hayvanları satacağım.
english: That's right, sir. That's right. I will sell the animals in this herd.

text: Vazifemden şüpheniz olmasın. Bu hayvanlardan, bu sürülerden ne beklersin beyim?
english: I'm sure it's my duty. What do you expect from these animals and flocks, sir?

text: Anası süt vermedi. Ne etinden, ne sütünden, ne yününden. Satacağız da kim alacak?
english: His mother didn't give him milk. Neither from his meat, nor from his milk, nor from his yule. We'll sell it. Who will buy it?

text: Kimse bakmaz bu hayvanların yüzüne. Alepli tüccarlar Türkmenlerle alışverişi çoktan bitirmiştir.
english: No one cares about these animals. The Aleppo merchants have already sold out their business with the Turkmens.

text: Siz bu güzel obada hayvanlarınızı bir besiye çekin hele.
english: Feed your animals in this beautiful tribe.

text: Vesiye çekin ki diliniz yuvasında işiniz yolunda olsun.
english: Make sure you have a place to live and a job.
Don't worry.

text: Ben bu hayvanları bol akçeye satacağım.
english: I will sell these animals to many farmers.

text: Sen başkasın beyim, biliriz. Sen ahalinin deliğini bilirsin. Sürünün de çobanın da ne istediğini bilirsin.
english: You're different sir. We know. You know the people's madness. You know what the herd and the shepherd want.

text: ...Azgın sular da tek başına koca bir sürü birini bile telef etmeden geçirdiğini gördük. Doğrudur bey. Doğrudur, doğru.
english: We saw him passing by a huge herd of people in the deep waters. That's right, sir. That's right.

text: Aklın fikrin savaşta değil, birliktedir. Yaparsan sen yaparsın beyim. Lakin biz bu sürüyü satamazsak halimiz perişandır.
english: You're right. You're right. You can do it if you want, sir. But if we can't sell this herd, we're in trouble.

text: Şimdi siz varın gidin hayvanlarınızı besiye çekin. Bu iş benim boynumun borcudur. Hadi eyvallah.
english: Now you go and feed your animals. This is my duty. Thank you.
What are we going to do now?
The shepherd's problem is the tribe's problem.
If you don't like it,
There is no peace in the tribe, brother.
I'm sorry.
There is a way, mother-in-law.
I don't know what your father says.
Now listen to me, Gundogdu.
Thank you.
It's time to go, sir.
Ertugrul Bey.

text: Sana sadece bir can borcum yok.
english: I owe you nothing.
You saved Aleppo.
and ruined the order of the Crusaders.

text: Bir gün alem-i İslam bu kahramanlığını hayırla yad edecek.
english: One day, the Islamic world will bless him with this heroism.

text: Anadolu ile bu toprakları bir edemezsek bütün edemezsek daha haçlılar çok tuzak kurarlar.
english: If we cannot unite Anatolia and these lands......the Crusaders will set many traps.
You're right.
Aleppo, Jerusalem, Damascus.
You're a fool.
and Baghdad and Konya

text: Ve daha nice şehir bir ananın evlatları gibidir.
english: and many other cities are like the children of a mother.

text: Her kim ki onları birbirinden ayırmaya kalkarsa...
english: Whoever tries to separate them...
He pays the price.
Thank you, sir.

text: Ne vakit bir ihtiyaç hasıl olursa, Halep sizin yuvanızdır.
english: Whenever you need me, Aleppo is your home.

text: Kapısı her daim sana ve obana açıktır.
english: The door to you and your tribe is always open.
...our weapons...

text: ...her daim sizin için kınından çıkmaya hazırdır.
english: is ready to take the throne for you.
what you have been through

text: Hepimizin malumudur. Sizin çektikleriniz de bizim malumumuzdur Hayme Ana.
english: We all know that. We know what you are after, mother Hayme.

text: Şehzade kız olmak zerrece itibar ettiğim bir şey değil.
english: Being a prince's daughter is not something I can rely on.
you

text: ...obanın kız olmaktan başka da bir isteğim yok.
english: I have no other wish but to be your daughter.

text: Bir şehzade kızı olarak babanı bırakıp...
english: ...leave your father as a girl of a Shahzada...

text: Bir yiğidin yanında obaya gelmenin ne demek olduğunu herkes çok iyi bilir kızım.
english: Everyone knows very well what it means to come to the tribe with a martyr.
Before
I asked Gokce.
I will ask you the same question.
For Ertugrul.
Would you do anything?
Yes.

text: Onu gerçekten seven bir kadının otağından, ailesinden gelecek......her türlü zorluğa göğüs germesi gerektiğini bilir misin?
english: Do you know that a woman who truly loves him......should face all kinds of difficulties......that will come from his family and his tent?
The bride of this tent.
the troubles of the tribe...
Do you know that you will be troubled?
I know, Mother Hayme.
for the sake of happiness.
...your own happiness.
Will you go away?
Let Ertugrul be.
Will you withdraw?

text: Ertuğrul için nasibime düşen bu satsa...
english: If what I have for Ertugrul is a curse...
I will live.

text: Kederse kanı kanı içerim Ayma Ana.
english: If he does, I will drink blood, Mother Hayme.

text: Konya'da, medresede ilim tahsil ettikten sonra......Süleyman Şah'ımın isteğiyle oba halkına yardım etmeye çalışıyorum.
english: After I learn the knowledge in the madrasa in Konya......I try to help the people of the tribe with the request of Suleyman Shah.

text: Kayı obasa halkı da canla başla hizmet ediyorlar.
english: They serve Kayo, Bosa and Halka with their lives.

text: Bu obanın ayrı bir kokusu var evlat.
english: This tribe has a different smell, son.

text: Öyle de bir ruhu var ki...
english: He has such a spirit that...
May God bless this tribe...
He will bring order to the world, God willing. God willing.
Do I have permission?
And peace be upon you.

text: Rahatınız yerinde midir? Eyvallah Ertuğrul Bey.
english: Are you all right? Thank you, Ertugrul Bey.
Ilyas Fakih is welcoming us.

text: Yarın cuma namazından sonra yola koyulacağım.
english: I will set off tomorrow after the Friday prayer.
Where, son?
To save my brother Turgut.
I am going to destroy the Templars' castle.
The children of the devil.
and set a trap.
Son, you're young, you're powerful, you're an Alp.
But he must be a state official.
The pens solve what the sword cannot.
We need to see the tricks.
The devil has many tricks.
If I were to ask the snow mountain that lies opposite...
Who are you talking to?
If I were to ask for your cold waters...

text: Katar katar develere sorar olsam, yüklet kimin?
english: I'd ask the camels, who's the loader?
If I were to ask your dark and sky tent...
Who is Gölge?
What is it, my lord?

text: Ağız dilden kız kişi haber verse bana.
english: If only the girl from the Azi language would let me know.
Understood.
What if he tells you?
I wish you a happy death, Karabas.

text: Hayme Ana'nın ağasını kervansarayda görünce Çiçek Hatun mu geldi aklına kardeş?
english: Did you think of Cicek Hatun when you saw Mother Hayme's mother in the caravan?

text: Bir günden bir güne gitti mi var ki?
english: I have been there and there.

text: Gördüğünde sordun mu Korkut Bey'e Çiçek Hatun neylermiş?
english: Did you ask Korkut what Cicek Hatun does?
I could not dare, brother.
You are always worried about me, brother.

text: Ben avrat diye pusatımı kuşanır, evlat diye atımı severim.
english: I am a woman, so I am armed with my sword. I am a son, so I love my horse.

text: Alp'ın bunca derdi varken avrat da ne ola ki be karınlaşım?
english: What is a woman to do when the Alps have so many problems?

text: Hayme Ana Erçol için ne olsa yapar mısın diye sordu.
english: ...and asked if I could do anything for Ertugrul.
What does that mean?

text: Sevdiğin için her şey katlanır mısın demek istedi.
english: He wanted to know if you could bear everything because you love him.

text: Ondan vazgeçecek kadar sever misin diye sordu.
english: He asked if you would love him enough to give up on him.
What did you say?

text: Ok yaydan çıkmıştır artık ana dedim.
english: I thought he was out of the game.

text: Aferin benim kardeşime. Asla vazgeçmeyeceksin. Vazgeçersen seni ölene dek ezer.
english: Well done, my brother. You will never give up. If you do, you will be crushed to death.

text: Yoksa Hayme Ana evladına hem seni hem de Halime'yi mi almak ister?
english: Or does Mother Hayme want to take your son, you and Halime?
Is that possible?
May I come in?
Thank you, my Bey.
My nephew is a world-famous pilot.
...has been blessed with the mercy of God.
May God bless us.
I'm very sorry, sister.

text: Allah size yeni evlatlar nasip etsin.
english: May God grant you new sons.
May God grant peace to our tribe, too.
Ertugrul Bey.

text: Halime bu obaya bir geldi, bir geldi.
english: Halime came to this tribe one by one.

text: Onun yüzünden kaç can toprak oldu. Kaç ananın yüreği dağlandı.
english: How many lives were lost because of him? How many mothers lost their lives?

text: Aykız Turgut'u kaybetti. Deli divane oldu, benim bebeğimi düşürüyor.
english: Aykiz lost Turgut. She's gone mad and is trying to take my baby.
I became your brother.

text: Eğer bu kız yüzünden daha fazla can yanacaksa gayrı yanmasın.
english: If you get hurt more because of her, you won't get hurt anymore.
Be honest.
Send him away from this tribe.
And you lost me, you are in trouble.
This tribe has a tradition.
...the men of this tribe...
The Hatuns do their own thing.
Hatuns.
If he gets involved in business,
The tribe will be in a mess.
I will not let the woman who spoils your peace.
I came to wish you good health, brother.
Give up on Halime Sultan's love.

text: Gayrı obada hiç kimsenin huzuru kalmadı.
english: No one in the tribe is left alone.
Thank God you are back safe and sound.

text: İkimizi de ilgilendiren bir konu vardır bilirsin.
english: You know there is something that concerns both of us.
She wants to see you as her daughter-in-law.

text: Benim gönlüm başka bir ateşe düşmüştür.
english: ...my heart is on fire.
You are my sister whom I grew up with.

text: Bunun ötesi belisi yoktur benim için.
english: I have no other choice.
I want you to know that.
I know, Ertugrul Bey.

text: Gönlün Halime Sultan derdi başka bir şey demez.
english: I am not afraid of anything.
I hope so.
...and the fate would be sad.
We should love our sadness.
Come as soon as you can.
I will wait for you until you die if necessary.
I'm sorry.

text: Bu mesele bundan sonra babanla senin arandaki meseledir.
english: This is between you and your father.
I came to my destiny.
I'm sorry Marcus.
I heard what happened.
I wanted to make him feel better, Aykiz.
Selcan is a dangerous woman.
Everything is expected of him.
You are right, Halime.
Only those who know he is dangerous know.
No one knows.
...that he has never seen.

text: Başımıza gelen tüm dertlerin asıl müsebbibi olanlar.
english: Those who are the real cause of all our troubles.
What do you mean, Aykiz?
Don't you see what we're going through, Halime?
You are responsible for everything.

text: Bu obanın başına ne dert geldiyse...
english: No matter what trouble this tribe is in...

text: Biz ayak bastıktan sonra geldi demez misin hiç kendine?
english: Don't you ever say that you came after we stepped on it?
You're right, Aykiz.

text: Daha kendi başımızı beladan söküp çıkaramazken.
english: ...when he couldn't even get us out of trouble.

text: Sizin başınızda belayı soktuk ama ben böyle olsun istemezdim.
english: We caused trouble for you, but I didn't want it to be like this.

text: Hem ben artık bir karar verdim.
english: Besides, I have made a decision.
I left my family behind and came here.
You're talking about yourself.
Turgut is a prisoner in the hands of the Templars.
We can't even get a single penny.
I'm here like this.
If Ertugrul is fine...
He's after you for days.
May I come in?
Yes, sir.

text: Sabah gündoğumadan Turgut'u almak için yola çıkacağız.
english: We will set out to get Turgut before dawn.
And we will not come without it.
Give me your blessings, Aykiz.
Thank you, my Bey.

text: Senden sonra kaleyle ilgili bilgileri almak isterim. Ne zaman istersen beyim.
english: I want to get information about the castle after you. Whenever you want, my Bey.
We will set off.
Get ready.
I was jealous, you know?

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im senin yüzünden Turgut'umu unuttu sanmıştım.
english: I thought that I had forgotten Turgut because of you.

text: Olur mu öyle şey Aykız? Hiç yakışır mı bir yiğidi Alp'ini unutmak?
english: Is that possible, Aykiz? Is it appropriate to forget a brave Alp?

text: Canı pahasına olsun sana getirecek Turgut.
english: He will bring you back to life, Turgut.
...in our tent tonight.
You're a bum.
My father will see to it.

text: Olmadı ocağın kenarına bir döşek atar.
english: If not, he will throw a mattress on the stove.
I came back. He said Halime is here.
Come on.
Let me go, sister.
Good girl, Gokce.
The trouble has returned to our tribe.

text: ...bakalım bundan sonra ne işler açacak başımıza o uğursuz kadın.
english: Let's see what he will do next.
Because he wants to settle in the tribe.

text: Ama ben onu buradan arkasına bile bakmadan nasıl yollayacağımı bilirim.
english: But I know how to send him away from here, without even looking back.
When it comes to you.
You will not go out of my words.
You will do what I say.
Or forget about Ertugrul.

text: Sen ne zamandan beri bu kadar acımasız oldun?
english: When did you become so heartless?

text: Geçmişte ne yaşandıysa unut artık abla.
english: Forget about what happened in the past, sister.

text: Tırtında taşıdığın yükü, kininin nefretini at.
english: Drop the burden you carry with your whip and the curse of the dog.

text: Sen böyle insanları kırdın müddetçe......kimse bu havada seni de beni de sevmeyecek. Gökçe kendine gel, ağzını topla!
english: As long as you are like this, no one will love you or me in this weather. Gokce, get yourself together.
You will add the two brothers to each other's life.
It's nothing, Gundogdu.

text: Bacımın biraz dili uzamış ablasına onu göstermekte.
english: My sister has a long tongue, so I will show it to her sister.
Come on, Sideshow.

text: Ortalık zaten bela dolu bir de sizinle uğraşmıyor.
english: The place is full of troubles and he is not dealing with you.
Do not worry, Gundogdu.

text: Hayme anam söyledi. Süleyman Şah'ım evlatları ve gelinleri akşam otağda yemek yemek istermiş.
english: Mother Hayme told me. Suleyman Shah wants his children and the bride to eat dinner in the tent.

text: Sizi bekliyor efendim. Biz aramızda gördük ya, Allah'a müşrik. Kepeğimi önce almaktan kurtuldum.
english: He's waiting for you, sir. We saw you in Ramazan. Thank God. We got rid of the dog's prey.
Thank you, Sadık.
Don't harm yourself.

text: ...çok yaşlı bir yaşamdan azabıyla nasıl yaşayacağım dayı?
english: How am I going to live with this suffering, uncle?
...when there are so many people in my life...
The dervishes who were martyred.
The soldiers who were martyred

text: Ben bu kadar insanın vebalini nasıl ödeyeceğim dayı?
english: How am I going to pay for all this?
Gafs-ul-Azam

text: Seyyid Abdülkadir Geylani Hazretlerinin hırkasını alan Şeyhim İbni Arabi.
english: my Sheikh Ibn Arabi, who took the coat of Seyyid Abdul Qadir Geylani.
One day he told me...
...the misfortunes you left behind...
It is decided not to do it again.
...the good deeds you do...
What is the meaning of that?
Don't leave him.

text: Akşam yemeğinde konuşacak çok meselemiz olacak dayı.
english: We will have a lot to talk about in dinner.
I hope so.
and call you to the family dinner.
He's calling me, right?

text: Benim gelmem uygun olur mu ki? Süleyman Şah'ım böyle uygun gördü.
english: Would I be fit to come? That's how Suleyman Shah sees fit.

text: Ertuğrul bey yarın Turgut'u almaya gidecek.
english: Ertugrul Bey will go to get Turgut tomorrow.
we don't know if it will come back.

text: Tüm sevdiklerimiz bir arada olalım dedi.
english: and all our loved ones together.
He wanted Deli Demir and Aykiz.
We'll be right back.
The brave Beys of the Kayi tribe.
You made my dinner delicious.
You may leave.
You made me a lucky man.
Bonjour.

text: Kaç zamandır diyar diyar bir yurt bulma hayaliyle dolaşıp dururuz.
english: How many times have we been wandering around with the dream of finding a home?

text: Yurdumuz olsun ki oğlanlarımız, kızlarımız şen olsun deyin. Doğru dersin beyim, görmediğimiz...
english: May our country be blessed with sons and daughters. You are right, my Bey.
We have no land left to step on.
we could not find a home to live in.

text: Bütün ümidimizi Halep'e bağladık. Burası da Süleyman Şah'ın evladı Ertuğrul yüzünden cehennem oldu. Artık takatimiz kalmadı Kurdoğlu.
english: We have tied all our hopes to Aleppo. And this place is hell because of Suleyman Shah's son, Ertugrul. We have no more strength left, Kurdoglu.

text: Nefes alamadan sebepsiz kavgaların içinde bulduk kendimizi.
english: We found ourselves in a fight without breathing.
That is what I am worried about.
If he goes like this...
I'm afraid our sons won't see the light of day.
That is true, my Bey. You are right, my Bey.
So what will we do Kurdoglu?
What is the solution?
He will save us from this trouble.

text: Tecrübeye sahip biz seni tanırız bu obada.
english: We know you from this tribe with experience.
Blackbeard.

text: Her zaman yiğit, her zaman açık sözlüydünüz.
english: You were always brave and open-minded.
You are still like that. Thank you.
I knew I could trust you.
...to Suleyman Shah...
The Bey should be in Gundogdu.

text: ...efirlerin vaffak olmaması için bize güç ver.
english: Give us strength to prevent the infidels from succeeding.
Strengthen our faith and our minds.
May God bless us.

text: Bu hain savaşta ölen askerlerimize şehitlik payisi var.
english: This traitor has killed our soldiers in the war.
I forgive the sins of El Aziz.
And you will make the Kayi tribe proud, Shahabeddin.
You were sentenced to death.
I'll show it to you all.
What do you mean?

text: Kumak kuşu gibi. Ne o öyle? Topla kendini.
english: Like a bird of prey. What is it? Get yourself together.
The one who is left on the table.
So, that is your problem.

text: Bu üç kaşıktan biri Ertuğrul'un ağabeyi Sungurtekin'in, diğeri Dündar'ın.
english: One of these three spoons belongs to Ertugrul's brother, Sungurtekin. The other is Dundar's.

text: Yani bir daha asla bu sofrada oturamayacak olan hayaletlerin.
english: I mean, the dreams that will never be able to sit at this table again.
When the rest of the people arrive...

text: Halime'nindir diye yüreğim pırpır eder belli ki.
english: I am sure your heart is beating because it is Halime's.

text: Süleyman Şah böyle bir şey yapmaz değil mi?
english: Suleyman Shah would not do such a thing, would he?

text: O ihtiyarı hâlâ tanıyamadım besbelli ki.
english: I still don't know that old man.

text: Dostum dediği, yüzüne güldüğü adamı bile ikiye biçecek kadar...
english: ...and the man she laughs at...
not that much.
Your husband will be here soon.
We will eat together.
The tribe is in danger.

text: ...Halebi tapınakçılardan, İslam dünyasını da büyük bir savaştan kurtardı o.
english: He saved Aleppo from the Templars and the Islamic world from a great war.

text: Onun uğruna obanın en gösterişli koşu kesildi. Hayme Ana evladı için en sevdiği yemeği yaptı. Bu gecenin meliki o, Melikes de sen olacaksın.
english: The most important person in the tribe was killed for him. Mother Hayme cooked for her son. He is the king of this night. You will be the queen.
Who else will come?

text: Bakalım babanın heybesinden kim çıkacak Gündoğdu'm?
english: Let's see who will be the father's favorite, Gundogdu.
She's with her mother.
I'll go see Dundar.

text: Hele bu yansın benim aslan kardeşim. Yeni yurdumuzda cümle aleme göstereceğiz.
english: May God help us, my brother. We will show our new home to the whole world.

text: Nasıl ok atılırmış, nasıl kılıç savrulurmuş?
english: How could he join them? How could he be shot?

text: Kalbini kıracak bir halt mı ettim ağabey?
english: Did I do something that would break your heart?
Do not worry, Ertugrul.
What's under your tongue?

text: Gökçe'nin gözyaşlarını hiç görmezsin dimi Ertuğrul?
english: You never see Gokce's tears, Ertugrul.
...how your heart bleeds.
You don't care about anything.
nor Gokce.
nor the marriage my father wanted.

text: Hep başının dikine gidip istediğin her şeyi elde edersin.
english: You always go head to head and get everything you want.

text: Ne de olsa beyimiz çok şanslı. İran kedisi gibi hep dört ayak üstüne düşer.
english: Anyway, our Bey is very lucky. He always gets the job done like a cat in Iran.

text: Tapınakçılar vız gelir tırıs gider. Koskoca Selçuklu Devleti'ne kafa tutar.
english: The Templars are furious and they are determined to take the Seljuk Empire.
What about my father?

text: Hele onun için yanıp tutuşan Gökçe.
english: Especially Gokce, who is fighting for him.
Who is he?
...when he had a daughter.
This one suits our Bey.
You do what suits you, Ertugrul.

text: Hele bakalım bu işin sonu nereye varacak?
english: Let's see how this ends.
you

text: Yeter benimle şu halinle uğraştığın, gel otur.
english: Stop trying to be like this. Come sit down.
I'm fine.
Don't worry.
It was Ertugrul Bey's place.
I was going to the Templars' castle with them in the morning.

text: Ertuğrul'un verdiği ayna değil mi bu?
english: Isn't this Ertugrul's mirror?

text: Bu aynaya her baktığında mutlu olasın.
english: May you be happy whenever you look at this mirror.
Two when one is one.
You are too much, Halime.
Amen, Aykiz.
But it's not easy.

text: Sen değil miydin bir vakit bana?
english: Weren't you the one who used to...
It is hard to be a woman.

text: Ama en zoru bir Alpin kadını olmaktır diyen.
english: But the hardest thing is to be an Alp's woman.

text: Aykız artık benim gidecek başka bir yerim yok.
english: I have nowhere else to go, Aykiz.

text: Ertuğrul'dan ve obanızdan başka sığınacak hiçbir yerim, hiç kimsem yok.
english: I have no place to hide from Ertugrul and your tribe.
I left my family behind.
I am no longer a Shahzada's daughter.
I am the daughter of your father.
May I come in, ladies?
Come, father.
Come on, let's go.
If I hadn't come...
I was wearing a robe...
Sitting at the same table with that woman.
Our Bey knows something, my dear.

text: Hem bütün öbür birbirimizin yüzüne bakacağız. Böyle küslük olmaz.
english: We will look at each other's faces. It is not a bad idea.

text: ...Kahit Bey'imizin başını kesmiştir efendim. Maalesef başını bulamadım.
english: They cut off the head of our head, sir. Unfortunately, we couldn't find the head.
Welcome, children.
I don't think he knows what we will do.
Mother, you didn't mention that you would be our guest.
They are not our guests, Selcan.
From our family.
Welcome.
It is time for the wedding.
Suleyman Shah...
He said he wanted to end the quarrels.
That's why...
For the sake of our new homeland...
We will all pray.
Welcome.
Sit down.
Hayme, you sit too.
Yes, sir.

text: Davetime icabet ettiğiniz için çok mutlu oldum.
english: I am very happy that you answered my invitation.
Bismillahirrahmanirrahim.
As my father said...

text: Bir dağ ne kadar ulu olursa olsun...
english: No matter how big a mountain is...
...on the way.
I have been waiting for you
I remember the day we left the Taurus Mountains.
It is not about getting down from the cliff.
...and fight against the games of the world of hajj...

text: Şehitler vererek gelip yerleştik bu yeni yurdumuza.
english: We came here as martyrs and settled in our new home.
...in the next episode.
It is not easy to migrate.
This time it won't be easy.
May God bless our martyrs.
He should give his relatives patience.
Even my little son Dundar
against the Crusaders...
...and save our tribe from a disaster.

text: Ağabeyleri gibi o da yiğitlik gösterdi.
english: He was as brave as his brothers.

text: Yakında soframızı da onda göreceğiz. İnşallah.
english: We will see him at our dinner soon. If God permits.
In this land that we have taken with our own hands...

text: Her şey güllük gülistanlık olmayacaktır elbet.
english: Everything will be fine.

text: Tutunmak için her daim mücadele edeceğiz.
english: We will always fight to be held.
In this...
I will give Gundogdu and Ertugrul great missions.
Both are in the future.

text: Obamızın beyliğine aday olduklarını fazlasıyla gösterdiler.
english: They showed that they were the Bey of our tribe.
...the sons of Suleyman Shah...
I want him to know and see it.
And when the time comes...
to the Beydom of our tribe.
Since then, Gundogdu...
...will be busy with our tribe's affairs.
The sale of our animals...
The sale of our goods in other cities...

text: ...bin türlü eşkıya ile mücadele edilmesini gerektiren zor bir görev.
english: ...and a thousand other kinds of violence.

text: Yeni yurdumuzda bize pek rahat vermeyecekler.
english: They won't give us much comfort in our new homeland.
Ertugrul...

text: ...obamızı haçlardan gelecek saldırılara karşı korumak için...
english: I have been working hard to protect our tribe
with his Alps.
With the permission of God...
Tomorrow, he will bring Turgut.
If God permits, my Bey.

text: El ele sır sırta verip obamıza zafer kazandıran oğullarımı...
english: I will never forget my sons who fought hand in hand
I appreciate it once again.

text: Hepimiz onlara müteşekkiriz. Eyvallah baba, eyvallah.
english: We are all grateful to them. Thank you, father.
It was very difficult for me.

text: Çok şükür ki sağlığın sıhhatiniz yerinde.
english: Thank God, your health is in good hands.
...and the Shahzadas...
and the forces that want to use you.
...will always exist.
If you think Suleyman Shah is suitable...

text: Ben devletine ihanet eden babamın değil.
english: I'm not a father who betrayed his daughter.
I want to be a daughter of this tribe.

text: Soyumdan bildiğim yiğit insanların yanında kocaman.
english: I have to live with brave men I know from my lineage.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imizle Gökçe'nin düğününe katılmanız hepimizi çok mutlu edecektir.
english: You and Ertugrul Bey will make us all very happy to attend Gokce's wedding.
Prince Yigit came to see me.

text: Yürüsünler, soframızda onlara da yer vardır.
english: Let them sleep. We have room for them at the table.
I told you about Mr. Karasin. Kara Toygar and...
I came here with my own hands, Afsin Bey.

text: Şehzadelere son görevimi yaptım, bildirmek için geldim. Süleyman Şah'ım.
english: I came to inform the Shahzadas that I made my last mission. Suleyman Shah.
Where is my father, Afsin Bey?

text: Şehzade, doğma! Devlet, kendine ortak olsana! Affetme!
english: Prince Omar. State! Be a partner! You won't get away with it.
I am grateful to you, Halime Sultan.
I buried him with my own hands.
I made my last appearance.
What happened, Afsin Bey?

text: Selçuklu Devleti gereği neyse onu yaptı. Ertuğrul Bey.
english: He did what the Seljuk state wanted him to do, Ertugrul Bey.

text: Devletine ihanet etse de o benim babamdı.
english: Even if he betrayed his state, he was my father.
We ruined our lives for him.

text: Kardeşimle kaçarken basmadığımız yer, görmediğimiz eziyet kalmadı.
english: We have no pain left in our body.
We always resisted.
The boy is so weak.
But my father was weak.
Maybe it was to protect us.
I won't be able to find out at this point.
He's not here anymore.
But I was afraid of him.

text: Teslim olmuş bir adam olarak değil.
english: not as a man who surrendered.
To protect his state.

text: Onu kullananlardan kaçarken gösterdiği cesaretiyle hatırlayacağım.
english: I will remember him with the courage he showed when he was running away from those who used him.
He was our father.
With their sins and their rewards.
Thank you, Ertugrul Bey.

text: Müsaaden olursa biz bu gece Yiğit ile babam için Kur'an okumak istiyoruz.
english: If you excuse me, I would like to recite the Qur'an for my father tonight.
Forgive me for my sins.
Thank you.
He was making a living. I was taking a break.
How is Halime Sultan?
Are you going to save my brother, Mugut?
They were very upset with him.

text: Bunu yapanların yanına bırakma Ertuğrul abi.
english: Don't leave this to the people who did it, Ertugrul.
Come on, Ertugrul Bey.
May God speed you.
If it's true...
You know I won't come without him.
If they did...

text: İntikamını almadan gelmeyeceksin, bunu da bilirim.
english: You won't come without taking your revenge. I know that.
Thank you, Ertugrul.
May God forgive their sins.

text: Babamdan sonra bir de senin acını yaşatma bana Ertuğrul.
english: Don't make me suffer after my father, Ertugrul.

text: Senden ilk ayrıldığım gün sana ne dediğimi hatırlıyor musun?
english: Do you remember what I told you the first day I left you?
Godspeed.
May the sun not burn your skin.
May the rain not cool you down.
We are at your feet.
Go away.
I want to be like him.

text: Ak Tolgalı kuş misali uçarak götürür...
english: ...and take the bird with the white-tailed bird...

text: Tez vakitte geri getirir o vakit.
english: He'll be back soon.
You were going to take the boat.

text: Kaleyi en iyi ben biliyorum. İzin ver seninle geleyim.
english: I know the castle best. Let me come with you.

text: Aykız'la ağabeyimin alpinden öğrenmem gereken ne varsa öğrendim.
english: I learned everything I had to learn from my brother.

text: Alplerimin katiliyle iş birliği yapan adamla işim olmaz benim Afşin.
english: I cannot deal with a man who cooperates with the murderer of my Alps.

text: Ölçsene be adam! Gelecek mi Gündoğdu?
english: Tell me, will Gundogdu come?
Yes, he will.

text: Ama bunu söylemek için gelmedim buraya.
english: But I didn't come here to tell you.
Why did you come?
Two men you are after.
And you are our guest.
Who are they?

text: Şehzade Yiğit de Harabi adında bir derviş.
english: Shahzada Yigit is a dervish named Arabi.

text: Bir de misafir geleceğini söylememi istedi size. Kim?
english: And he asked me to tell you that a guest will come. Who?
Allahumma waza'anil.

text: Halifetül Resul Melikül Aziz ve Emirina Süleyman Şah.
english: the Caliph of the Prophet, the beloved King and our leader, Suleyman Shah.
The sun is rising.
and the earth will be like a mountain
Allah Almighty says in His Noble Book,
Alhamdulillah, Alhamdulillah, Alhamdulillahi Rabbil Alamin.

text: Ve selatu ve selamu ala Resulina Muhammedin ve ala alihi ve sahbihi ecmain.
english: And peace and blessings be upon our Prophet Muhammad and upon his family and companions.
And praise be to God, Lord of the worlds.
Dear Muslims!

text: Yüce Allah Nisa suresinde buyurur ki......kim Allah'a ve Resulüne itaat ederse...
english: Allah says in the surah Nisa......that whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger...

text: Allah'ın kendilerine lütuflarda bulunduğu peygamberler, sıddıkiler, şehitler ve salih kişilerle beraberler.
english: ...the prophets, the righteous, the martyrs and the righteous......who Allah has bestowed on them.
What a nice friends.

text: Bir Müslümanın en önemli vasfı sıdıkiyettir. Nedir sıdıkiyet?
english: The most important attribute of a Muslim is sincerity. What is sincerity?
...is always right.
He should speak the truth when he speaks.
The path he walks on should be the right one.
Shut up!

text: İnsanı hakka ulaştıran yolların en sağlamı.
english: The most sound way to reach the truth.

text: Doğrular da bu yolun en halis yolcularıdır.
english: The righteous are the most honest of the road.
Dear Muslims.
From the flood, Hazrat Nuh...
From the fire, to Hazrat Ibrahim.
...from the well...
and the Prophet from their idolaters...

text: En önemli sır onların sıddık olmalarıdır.
english: The most important secret is that they are loyal.
May God make us righteous.
and the ones who always incite strife...
...and protect the people who set traps.
Amen.
Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar!
Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar.
I swear there is no god but Allah
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah
I hear that Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah.
I say to Muhammad, the Messenger of Allah,
Hayyala Saleh!
Hayyaleh Saleh!
Hayya ala alfala!
Hayya ala alfala!
Redgar, Matus, Salaf. Redgar, Matus, Salaf.
Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar!
La ilaha illallah. Allahu Akbar.
Alhamdulillah Rabbil Alameen. Ar-Rahman Ar-Rahim.

text: Maliki yevmeddin iyâke nâvidü ve iyâke nesta'în.
english: Malik-i Yevmeddin is either a prophet or a prophetess.

text: İhtina sırata'l-mustaqîm, sırata'l-lezîne en'amte aleyhim, gayr-il-mâğdûbi aleyhim ve let-dâliyn.
english: Take care of the straight path, the path of those who have been given the right path, the path of those who have not been killed, and do not go astray.
We have given you the Kephther.

text: Fesellili Rabbike venhar. İnne şâniyeke hüveleb der.
english: فَسَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَنْهَارٍ إِنَّ شَانِيَكَ هُوَ لَبْتًا
Allahu Akbar.
Semiallahu liman hamid.
Allahu Akbar. Allahu Akbar.

text: Şimdi bana bak ve tekrar et.
english: Look at me and repeat.
Marca Volando.
I will not let you go.
If you go to Genova one day,

text: Bütün kızlar seninle konuşmak için can atacaklar.
english: All the girls will be dying to talk to you.
I'll say you're a mother to him, but...
You look like you're in love.
Don't confuse me with you.
Your fate.
Stupid bird.
I
Give him your blessings.
Sir, they sent this from Aleppo.
He left the mouth open. It was Sahabeddin's gift.
I can't stand it.
or hell.
May my sword be red and blue!
I'm a man, you know.
You don't want to get into the D, do you?

text: ...kurtu kurtarmak istiyorsun ama nasıl yapacağını bilmiyorsun.
english: You want to save the boat but you don't know how.

text: Nasıl yapacağını söylersem siz de gelmeme izin verir misin Artur Bey?
english: If I tell you how to do it, will you let me come with you, Artur Bey?
Cardinal Thomas.
Take care.
Who are you?
You're a real man. What was it?
I'm an ENS.
We can go and see the herd if you want.
I would like to, of course.

text: Lakin önce iş yapacağım adamı tanımak isterim.
english: But first I want to know the man I will work for.
What do you want to know, Gundogdu?

text: ...şu soysuz tapınakçı takımından olup olmadığını mesela.
english: ...about the Templar team.
You are a young man.

text: Bu lafından sonra daha da çok sevdim.
english: I liked her more after she said that.
Sit down.
Do you want soup?
It's Harput's famous soup.
Okay, we'll drink.
Warm us up.
Give our Bey some soup.
Knocked your letter.
As an Orthodox,
I hate the Templars.
Such hatred that
As a Muslim?
Your hatred will never go away.
I'm glad we have a common point.
I'm not crazy.
Then we can talk.

text: ...görekli olsalar o koca koca taşların ardına yuvalanmazlardı.
english: If they were alive, they wouldn't be buried behind those big rocks.
Everyone is brave like us, right?

text: göğü kalkan yeri pusat eyleyecek ha?
english: He will destroy the place where the sky rises.

text: Onların kafalarını o koca koca taşların altında ezmez miyiz be?
english: We won't let them go under those huge stones.

text: Bu kale gibi nice tapınak çürüsü Akdeniz'in tamamına hakim.
english: Many Templars like this one rule the whole of the Mediterranean.
These bastards.

text: Papa'yı bile kendi çıkarları için tehdit ederler.
english: They even test the Pope for his own interests.

text: Kardinal de onların papa yapmak istediği adam.
english: The cardinal is the man they want to make a pope.
I have a lot of kefara.
In the tribe, in our tent.
The Islamic world is a piece of cake.
We don't even have a jihadist state.

text: Her şey göründüğü gibi değildir Arturul Bey.
english: It is not as it seems, Arturul Bey.

text: Bugün kara bulutlar üzerimize çökse de...
english: Even if the dark clouds fall on us today,
It is for the rain to fall on us.
Our states will remain intact forever.

text: Bizim devletimiz bir bakarsın Oğuz olur.
english: Our state is like Oghuz.
...and the world.
You think he is Gokturk.
...and bring the stones to life.

text: Bir bakarsın çift başlı kartal olur, Ali Selçuk'a can verir.
english: You see, he becomes a double-headed cartel and gives life to Ali Selçuk.
I told him...

text: Ezansız, sancaksız ve devletsiz kalmazlar Ertugrul Bey.
english: They will not be without the azan, flag and state, Ertugrul Bey.
Let's take this card.

text: Daha sonra devlet konuşuruz seninle Afşin bey.
english: We'll talk about the state later, Afsin Bey.
I did it!
Send him here as a messenger.
...our hearts are broken.
He's here.
May God bless you.
Did you do your job, Titus?

text: Alepteki teşkilatımızı kaybettiğiniz için mi canınız sıkkın?
english: Are you upset because you lost our organization in Aleppo?
Maybe a little.
Because of what El Aziz caused.
Our knight who will replace Shahabeddin...
will make us stronger than ever before.
The matter is not just about Aleppo.
The border is in Brunswick.
Provence de Amman.
...to the Aragonese Toro.
And finally, Montague.

text: Bu büyük ustaların aziz hatırasına karşı...
english: I will make a great sacrifice...
...or being unsuccessful...
I prefer to die, Titus.
We will not let him, sir.
You are the Grand Master of Antioch.
When we have the Codex...
will be.
Your name will be heard in the hearts of people.

text: Bakalım misafirlerimiz de aynı şeyi söyleyecek mi?
english: Let's see if our guests will say the same thing.
Who is coming, sir?
The Kudus, Akka and Trablus commanders.
They are coming with the order of Grand Ustad Montague.

text: Artık hiçbir başarısızlığa tahammül edemeyiz Titus.
english: We can't tolerate any more failures, Titus.
Then...
Harder. More visible.

text: Ve en az o barbarlar kadar vahşi olmak zorundayız.
english: And we have to be as wild as those barbarians.
Do you understand me?
By the way...
Everyone we've been looking for is here.
What do you want, Eftel?
I want to apologize, Cardinal Hazretleri.
...and get rid of my sins.
Our sins are our medals, Eftelya.
with pride.
I'll cut your eyes off. No!
What do you want?
For Torul.
How could I have a son like him?
I will live.
I will drink to my heart's content.
I see.

text: Bazen oğlumun mutluluğuna gölge düşürüyorum diye düşünmeden edemiyorum.
english: Sometimes I can't help but think that I'm giving my son happiness.
Obviously...
They are in love with each other.
...from the words...
You shouldn't take a step back, right?
Ben Thomas.

text: Ama karşı taraftan biri adım atarsa o başka.
english: But if someone steps in from the other side, that is different.
My Bey, are you alright?
I think the vengans have started to attack.

text: Bir daha bu acıya dayanamam. Şurada biraz merhem kalmış olur. Dur.
english: I can't bear this pain anymore, Hayme. There is some water left over there. Wait.
Wait, let me...
I sent them to the castle.
Still no news.
I hope nothing bad happens to him.

text: Beyim ne olur düşünme artık bunları.
english: My Bey, please don't think about them anymore.
You are good, right?

text: Takya'dan çabuk dönmeniz için dua edeceğim Kardinal Hazretleri.
english: I will pray for you to return from the battle as soon as possible.

text: Ben de dualarınız kabul olsun diye elimden geleni yapacağım Eftelya.
english: I'll do whatever you ask me to do.
I have no reason to be in this ominous place.
Damn you too!
I'll come back.
From the Kayi tribe, Suleyman Shahoglu Ertugrul.
The job is done.
The Doros are done.

text: İşli kontun ama göz diktin Ertuğrul.
english: You were a good man, Ertugrul.
We have no eyes on your lands, Papaz Efendi.
I know that.
You are making a big sin, my son.
In the service of God.
You're not the one.
Don't do that.

text: Senin gibi bir Türkiye daha çok yakışır.
english: A Turk like you would be perfect.

text: İstediğimi alana kadar sadece seni misafir edeceğim.
english: I will only host you until I want to.
Won't you tell me?
Do I have permission to come in?
Come on, son.
I missed my brother's hunger.

text: Hayırlı emmi olursan aşımızdan hep yersin Kurdoğlu.
english: If you become a good uncle, you will always get better, Kurdoglu.
Here you go. Enjoy.
Tell me, my good man.
What did you talk about with Tato Sarput?
I took the animals to the war camp. They liked the herd.

text: Biraz sıskan buldu ama ben bunlara illa ki bir alıcı bulurum dedi. İstediğim fiyatın da çok üstüne anlaştık.
english: He was a bit jealous but he said he would find a buyer for them. We agreed on the price that I wanted.
The people will be very pleased.
...your reputation in the tribe will increase even more.

text: Lakin adamın hayvanları satacağı yer bize ne ondan?
english: But the place where he sells animals is none of our business.
After I give him the money...

text: İsterse denize döküp balıklara yem yapar. Ama...
english: He can even go to the sea and cook for the fish.

text: Adam hayvanları Antakya'ya götürecek. Haçlı konutluğuna. Müşterileri oradaymış. Ne vardır bunda Gündoğdu?
english: He will take the animals to Antakya, to the pilgrimage home. His customers are there. What is in it, Gundogdu?
Don't talk as if you don't know my father, Selcan.

text: İhtiyarı ikna edersen Gündoğdu, obaya refah gelir.
english: If you convince the old man, Gundogdu, the tribe will be at peace.
If there is prosperity, there is peace.

text: Her kim ki bu huzursuz obaya huzur getirir...
english: Whoever brings peace to this restless tribe...
The Beydom is his right.
We met again after years.
Not after years, Tomas.
I was in the castle months ago.
You're the one who's the one.
Well done, Thomas.
You came to the castle to take Turgut.
Now you've imprisoned me.
You will escape.
Good job, Thomas.

text: Her pazar ayın için Antakya'ya gittiğini bildiğimizden...
english: Every Sunday, when we know that the traitor has gone to Antakya,
We wanted to make it worth it.
What can I do for you?
You may start by giving your robe.
Mr. Petruccio.
What will happen if you don't want to give Turgut?

text: Biz bir şekilde Turgut Alp'i oradan alırız.
english: We will somehow get Turgut Alp from there.
Can they take you from me?
I don't know.
Take that Black Priest.
Take your brother, Abdurrahman.
Tell my father what happened.
Send Kale.
Let us get back to work.
They only let me go, sir.

text: Ne istiyorlar? Titus'un Turgut Alp'i götürüp teslim etmesini.
english: What do they want? Titus to take Turgut Alp and hand him over.
against the Cardinal...
Yes, sir.
Is what he said true, sir?
I'm just checking.

text: Bu tarafta şeytan sinsi sinsi sırıtıyor.
english: And the devil is making a scene everywhere.
Ducky.

text: Bırak o uğursuz Türk Thomas'ı öldürsün.
english: Let that useless Turk kill Thomas.
Then I look at the other side.
He says...
Let Turgut do what he has to.
Should I listen to Melek?
or the devil.
What did we meet again, Turk?
I promised.

text: Ve gördüğüm kadarıyla sözünde durduğun için bu kara papazı alıp gidebilirsin.
english: And as far as I can see, you can take this Black Priest with you.
But next time...
One of us was going to die, Tudur.

text: Bazen birbirimize ne kadar benzediğimizi düşünüyorum.
english: Sometimes I think how much we look alike.
We are both stubborn.
We will never give up.

text: İkimiz de kutsal bildiğimiz değerler için.
english: For the sacred values we know.
We are fighting for our great family.

text: İkimiz de birbirimizin yüzünden en iyi silahşörlerimizi kaybettik.
english: We both lost our best gunners because of each other.
We are both the murderers of our brothers.
You may be right, Titus.
But not about being a murderer.

text: Senin kardeşin Bisol elinde pusatıyla benimle savaşarak onuruyla öldü.
english: Your brother Bisol died with his sword in his hand, fighting with me.
But you...
Poor boy.
He attacked me treacherously.
He's still alive.
But he did not open his eyes, brother.

text: Ama şunu çok iyi biliyorum ki...
english: But I know this very well.
The day I killed you...
He will come back.
You will die an dishonest death.

text: Kardeşinin intikamını alamamanın verdiği acıyla öleceksin.
english: You will die with the pain of your brother not taking his revenge.
Take out the sack on the head of Turgut Alp.
Solve it, Cardinal.
My Turgut Alp.

text: Alp'in ellerini biz gittikten sonra çözersin.
english: If you solve the problem after we leave,
See you again.
I will.
In Intel.
There is no God but Allah, the All-Mighty.
